sentences.sContent: These groups must renounce violence if there is to be progress towards peace.
sentences.sCn: 若要迈向和平，这些组织就必须放弃使用暴力。

sentences.sContent: Young people renounced capitalism in favour of peace and love.
sentences.sCn: 年轻人提倡和平和友爱，摒弃资本主义。

synos.tran: 宣布放弃；与…断绝关系；垫牌

remMethod.val: re(重新) + nounc(讲话， 通告) + e → 重新宣布 → 声明放弃

trans.tranOther: to publicly say or show that you no longer believe in something, or will no longer behave in a particular way
